Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry

Class SpanStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.SpanStatus
  • public class SpanStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the status of a span. A span can be unset (default), OK (successful), or ERROR (failed).
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

      Returns the status message, if any.

      Returns true if this status indicates an error.
      boolean isOk()
